title: 动态环绕怎么关掉当玩家到达较高地方眼前变模糊
author: 番茄dada
txt_content:
动态环绕Dynamic Surroundings：http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=547831
怎么关掉当玩家到达较高地方视野变模糊的问题？我不会改config设置，求助！{:10_518:}

replies.author: zhuqinghe
replies.txt_content:
番茄dada 发表于 2016-6-7 17:26
这个mod的config文件叫什么名字？麻烦你了
\.minecraft\config\dsurround\dsurround.cfg

replies.author: l1219698839
replies.txt_content: 我没下载这mod时看远处也是模糊的

replies.author: 番茄dada
replies.txt_content:
l1219698839 发表于 2016-6-7 15:38
我没下载这mod时看远处也是模糊的
这个mod到达高处时能见度变得超低

replies.author: 熊镔
replies.txt_content: 能不能把config文件夹下的此mod的配置文件内容以文本的形式发上来？我看看能不能翻译

replies.author: zhuqinghe
replies.txt_content:
# Higher the player elevation the more haze that is experienced [default: true]
    B:"Elevation Haze"=true
    设为false直接关闭

replies.author: 番茄dada
replies.txt_content:
zhuqinghe 发表于 2016-6-7 16:47
# Higher the player elevation the more haze that is experienced [default: true]
    B:"Elevation ...
这个mod的config文件叫什么名字？麻烦你了

replies.txt_content:
